SDG_GOAL: Goal 4: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
SDG_TARGET: Target 4.6: By 2030, ensure that all youth and a substantial proportion of adults, both men and women, achieve literacy and numeracy
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 4.6.1: Proportion of population in a given age group achieving at least a fixed level of proficiency in functional (a) literacy and (b) numeracy skills, by sex
STAT_CONC_DEF: The proportion of youth (aged 15-24 years) and of adults (aged 15 years and above) who have achieved or exceeded a fixed level of proficiency in (a) literacy and (b) numeracy.
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 4: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 4.6: By 2030, ensure that all youth and a substantial proportion of adults, both men and women, achieve literacy and numeracy
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 4.6.1: Proportion of population in a given age group achieving at least a fixed level of proficiency in functional (a) literacy and (b) numeracy skills, by sex
